revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=ASUS |model=RT-AC55U |revision= |asin=B00TZ7GZ7Q;US; |newegg=9SIADZJ5W23532 |est_release_date=02/24/2015 |fcc_date=09/10/2014 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=now |type=wireless router, access point, media bridge |fcc_id=MSQ-RTAC55U |ic_id=3568A-RTAC55U |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |cpu1_model=QCA9557;QCA9557-AT4A, PRY693.002C, 1343, CHINA; |cpu1_cspeed=720 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Zentel |fla1_model=A5U1GA31ATS-BC |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4T1G164QG-BCF7 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, USB 3.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9557;QCA9557-AT4A, PRY693.002C, 1343, CHINA; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL, RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=QCA9882;QCA9882-BR4A, NHR736.001B, 1340, TAIWAN; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL, RP-SMA |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |sw_model=QCA8337N;QCA8337N-AL3C, E56549.1B, 1411, TAIWAN; |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Richwave;RTC6649E;207, 649E, 421;3; ,,, 5GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SKY85402;SKY85402, 342HR, 1342 MY;2; ,,, USB 3.0 Controller;EtronTech;EJ168A;EtronTech, EJ168A, S074207, MSS20001;1; |flags=AiCloud support |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=ASUS, ASUS_5G |default_ssid_regex=^ASUS$,,, ^ASUS_5G$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=AC:9E:17 |oui_eth=AC:9E:17 }} {{TagLine|Dual-band Wireless-AC1200 Gigabit Router}} :{{ProductPage|http://www.asus.com/Networking/RTAC55U/}} The FCC photos indicate this device has a :single USB 2.0 and a single USB 3.0 port. Default settings are per the FCC label. *[https://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/asus/asus_rt-ac55u ''Asus RT-AC55U'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki] ===Specifications=== *Product class: ''AC1200'' (300Mbps [2.4GHz] + 867Mbps [5GHz]) *Antennas: 2x external dipole antenna w/ RP-SMA connector *Ports: USB: 1x ''USB 2.0'', 1x ''USB 3.0'' :Ethernet: 1x WAN, 4x LAN (10/100/1000 Base-T) *Power Supply: :AC Input: 110~240V (50~60Hz) :DC Output: 12V with max. 2A current *Vendor firmware operation modes: :wireless router, access point, media bridge * Vendor firmware features: :''AiCloud'', USB file / printer / scanner sharing [http://www.asus.com/Networking/RTAC55U/], :''ASUSWRT'' interface, ''Smart QoS'' ([https://www.qca.qualcomm.com/products/qualcomm-streamboost/ StreamBoost?]) *''ASUS'''s product page also notes this product has 'AiRadar' support :(whatever that marketing term is), yet the blurb indicates usage of a :[[Broadcom]] chipset which contradicts the FCC filing for this device. ===Reviews=== *[http://www.hardware-boom.com/asus-rt-ac55u-review/ On '''Hardware-Boom'''] *[http://www.ixbt.com/comm/asus-rt-ac55u.shtml On '''iXBT'''] (RU) ===Forum threads=== *[http://koolshare.cn/thread-1800-1-1.html On '''koolshare.cn'''] :F/W Ver.: V3.0.0.4.374 :S/N: EBICRxxxxxxx :MAC: AC9E17xxxxxx :PSU: DVE DSA-24PFD-15 FCH 120200 ::AC: 100~240V ~50/60Hz 0.8A ::DC: +12V รท2A ===Serial=== {{SCollapse |CPU info |
